Transcription for 547092

A hundred Christian soldiers marching as to war, With the cross of Jesus, though in a before.
Christ the royal master beats against the foe, For worrying to battle sin is bad as old.
A hundred Christian soldiers marching as to war, With the cross of Jesus, though in a before.
Christ the royal master beats against the foe, For worrying to battle sin is bad as old.
A hundred Christian soldiers marching as to war, With the cross of Jesus, though in a before.
Christ the royal master beats against the foe.
